long_description: How cool is this? The Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Sling Daypack morphs from a single-strap sling bag for around-town use into a 2-strap backpack for short hikes or sightseeing. This innovative, ultralight bag is made from highly durable and water-resistant silnylon (nylon impregnated with silicone). Expands from a capacity of 16.5L to 18.5L as the sling converts to a hydration-compatible daypack (hydration reservoir not included). Second shoulder strap zips away in the expandable portion. Color-coded webbing loops and clips show you where to connect the pack straps. Main compartment has finger-friendly zipper pulls that can take a lock (lock not included). 2 side stretch pockets; side compression strap. Adjustable mesh backpack straps wick moisture for a comfortable carry. Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Sling Daypack has reflective accents for low-light visibility. Included carry/storage pouch can double as an internal security pocket. Washable.
short_description: How cool is this? The Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Sling Daypack morphs from a single-strap sling bag for around-town use into a 2-strap backpack for short hikes or sightseeing.
